full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KHYAD DU 'PHAGS PA'I BSTOD PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010B KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PA'I BSTOD, SLOB DPON MTHO BTZUN GRUB RJES MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,(RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SARBBA DZNY'A DE P'A DANG, ZHU CHEN @011A *, ,GYI LO TZ'A BA RIN CHEN MCHOG GIS BSGYUR, ,SLAD KYI BANDE DPAL BRTZEGS RAKshI TAS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,, ` AOm SVASTI, BRAM ZE SLOB DPON MTHO BTZUN GRUB RJE YIS, ,BSTAN PA'I NGANG TSUL RTOGS NAS STON PA LA, ,YID CHES DAD PAS KHYAD PAR 'PHAGS BSTOD MDZAD, ,DE TSE YUL DER KUN GYIS GLU RU LEN, ,DENG DUS YUL 'DIR MTSAN NYID GRVA RIGS 'GA', ,MA GTOGS GZHAN RNAMS YOD MED MA TSOR BAS, ,KYI HUD DE 'DZIN 'BYUNG NA SNYAM BSAM PAS, ,DGE SLONG BLO GROS BRTAN PAS SPAR DU BSGRUBS, ,DGE BAS KUN KYANG MCHOG GSUM GTZUG TU BSTEN, ,BSTAN 'DZIN ZHABS BRTAN 'DUS SDE'I BSHAD SGRUB RGYAS, , SKYE BO KUN KYANG DGE BCU'I KHRIMS KYIS 'TSO, ,THAMS CAD THUB BSTAN YAR 'PHEL SKYEN GYUR CIG , ,,)
